tasks.label: Lint (Super Linter)
tasks.command: docker run --rm --env-file .github/env/super-linter.env -e RUN_LOCAL=true -e CREATE_LOG_FILE=true -e LOG_FILE=super-linter-summary.log -e DEFAULT_BRANCH=develop -e GITHUB_WORKSPACE=/github/workspace -v ${workspaceFolder}:/github/workspace ghcr.io/super-linter/super-linter:v8
tasks.detail: Run GitHub Super-Linter locally against the repository using Docker
